item.title: SpaceX Sends Northrop Grumman’s Large Cargo Ship To Orbit In Its Debut Flight
item.description: The mission, named NG-23, will deliver science investigations, supplies, and equipment to the International Space Station, according to NASA.

item.description: This is the fourth meeting between the two sides in four months.
